com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.attribute

Interface AttributeHandler<V>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AttributeSerializer<V>, OrderPreservingSerializer<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDecimal.AbstractDecimalSerializer, BooleanArraySerializer, BooleanSerializer, ByteArraySerializer, ByteSerializer, CharacterSerializer, CharArraySerializer, DateSerializer, Decimal.DecimalSerializer, DoubleArraySerializer, DoubleSerializer, FloatArraySerializer, FloatSerializer, Geoshape.GeoshapeSerializer, IntArraySerializer, IntegerSerializer, LongArraySerializer, LongSerializer, Precision.PrecisionSerializer, ShortArraySerializer, ShortSerializer, StringArraySerializer, StringSerializer

    public interface AttributeHandler<V>
    Allows custom handling of attributes inside Titan when it comes to a) data validation and b) conversion of different data types to the target type.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V convert(Object value)
      Converts the given (not-null) value to the expected datatype V.
      void verifyAttribute(V value)
      Verifies the given (not-null) attribute value is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • verifyAttribute

        void verifyAttribute(V value)
        Verifies the given (not-null) attribute value is valid. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the value is invalid, otherwise simply returns.
        Parameters:
        value - to verify

      • convert

        V convert(Object value)
        Converts the given (not-null) value to the expected datatype V. The given object will NOT be of type V. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if it cannot be converted.
        Parameters:
        value - to convert
        Returns:
        converted to expected datatype
